data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sites, Robert W., Reynoso-Velasco, Daniel, Novelo-Gutiérrez, Rodolfo (2013): Revision of the Mesoamerican Genus Cataractocoris Usinger (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Naucoridae). Zootaxa 3682 (3): 475-484, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3682.3.8
